original_text: Wherefore my fury and mine anger was poured forth, and was kindled in the cities of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem; and they are wasted and desolate, as at this day.
korean_text: 나의 분과 나의 노여움을 쏟아서 유다 성읍들과 예루살렘 거리를 불살랐더니 그것들이 오늘과 같이 폐허와 황무지가 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: Wherefore my fury and mine anger was poured forth,
and was kindled in the cities of Judah
and in the streets of Jerusalem;
and they are wasted and desolate,
